title: Your main(s) have lost their house, and you've agreed to let them live with you for a month
body:
Oh no! Your main, through some way or another, has lost their house/place of dwelling. They can get everything sorted out in a month, but need somewhere to stay until then. In the meantime, you've agreed to let them stay with you! Some things to think about for this scenario:

1: What would it be like living with them for a month? 
2: What would your house look like after they moved out? 
3: Would it be fun living with them?
4: Regarding the above, if your main is {{champion:103}} , remember: She'll probably steal your 'fun' memories. How does that make you feel?

Optionally, just summarize how it would be.

replies.body: {{champion:157}} {{champion:17}} I'd rather not get cancer
If you main those two, it's already too late.
very true
{{champion:143}} She'd just live in the backyard.

{{champion:13}}: Don't read my scroll.

Me: ...

.
Me: I'm gonna read it.

{{champion:13}}: ...
Me: ...so I'm just going to get your scroll now.
{{champion:13}}: _ Suddenly jerks up._ I sense a rune!
Me: What?!
{{champion:13}}: _Slams his palm onto my carpet._ Let's go! let's go! _A blue circle rapidly expands around the spot he hit, until it covers my whole apartment. Ancient runes glow with arcane energy on the walls and furniture._
Me: What the f---. _My table, my lamp, my books, and everything, including myself is forcibly sucked into the blue portal like a water to a drain_
{{champion:13}}: Come! The runes beckon.

Vision darkens and I feel faint, as the world comes spinning around me. Though I regain my senses quickly enough. I look out the window. It's dark. There's also a giant eyeball outside with tentacles. I guess I live in the void now.

"Where are we?!?"
{{champion:13}} "We're... no, this can't be. We're in a dystopian future!"
"...WHAT?!?"

*Back to the Future music plays*

Me: HOW THE FUCK DO YOU LOSE A GIANT FLOATING CASTLE?

Me: gah.
{{champion:134}} So, do I have to kick you out?
Me: I'll take the couch.

I would never see him but I would keep tripping over his stuff {{champion:17}}

Melledoneus: I'm so glad you can move in for a while, Shenpai- er, Shen, Eye of Twilight.
{{champion:98}} I am honored. *Bows respectfully*
Melledoneus: *Suppresses a squee of delight*
{{champion:98}} Hold on... you have an evil spirit here...
Melledoneus: Really? Where?
{{champion:98}} ...there.
Melledoneus: *Gasps* The pantry. I KNEW it!
{{champion:98}} You can sense them as well?
Melledoneus: No, the pickles and cookies kept going missing and the jars were being left open.
{{champion:98}} ...oh. Well, allow me to eradicate it for you-
Melledoneus: No need, let me show you to your sleeping quarter first, haha.
{{champion:98}} ...alright...
Melledoneus: Here it is.
{{champion:98}} Hm... this is quite a peaceful room. And that bed... it looks like a bed big enough for two.
Melledoneus: Yeah, I bought it just for this occas- I-I mean, yes, I bought it so long ago I forgot what it was for, haha.
{{champion:98}} *Raises an eyebrow suspiciously* Is this where you normally sleep? I would feel awful if it is.
Melledoneus: Uh... n-no, of course not! I... have my own room...
######...the couch in the living room will have to do...
{{champion:98}} Well, as a sign of gratitude, allow me to eradicate that spirit.
Melledoneus: Make yourself comfortable, I'm sure your mask is getting annoying to wear at this point.
{{champion:98}} Oh, no, I cannot. This month is my resilience training where I wear my armor even in my sleep.
Melledoneus: Oh... ok...
{{champion:98}} I shall return soon. *Grabs spirit sword and leaves the room*
Melledoneus: I'll just grab my things and take them to the living room...
#T_T

______________________________________

I think Braum would be a pretty cool dude to hang out with, probably gives killer massages, he's just that kind of bro.

{{champion:35}} 

Fuck. Too much orange smoke, too many boxes.
I would probably still be finding random boxes for ages and the walls would probably be trashed from all the clone-splosions.
It wouldn't be so much fun as utterly terrifying, think Saw mixed with Jaws, with a dabble of the Dark Crystal.
Granted, if it's just Adam Harrington crashing at my place that would be pretty cool.

{{champion:45}} 

.... Endless short jokes... or at least until he nukes me from orbit in my sleep.
House? I think you mean "crater".
Depends, can they teach me how to use magic to infinitely gain power for personal gain? Because if so hot damn could I make a lot of money as a bodyguard or assassin. "What do you mean the boss is dead?" "Well this giant black glowey space wall formed around giant obsidian pillars knocked everyone unconscious and when we woke up the only thing left was pieces".

{{champion:72}} 

Too many glowing rocks, but it wouldn't be too bad if they were outside, would make for good rave lights.
I figure he'd rather be surrounded by natural materials, so he probably wouldn't affect the house too much in theory.
I'm imagining riding a gigantic crystal scorpion around town and wondering what part of it wouldn't be fun. Granted he is kind of depressed seeming with the whole "All of his kind are dead" thing, so depending on how much that was a problem for him maybe not super fun, but hey, people gotta grieve.

{{champion:4}}  I suppose he can help with the financial issues.

{{champion:497}} There are only 2 beds in this house, I better get a thank you since I don't use mine.

{{champion:427}} This would be awesome, assuming he can provide food and freshen this air.

Imagine the salt you must feel when the month is over...

{{champion:103}} : "Oh, and what you've been looking forward to? Your fifteen memories of it gave me enough magic to create a new house!"

{{champion:30}}...

1. I'd be dodging a lot of exploding skittles for the whole month as he relentlessly tried to murder me while preaching about how death is awesome.
2. It would be absolutely destroyed if I was good at dodging his q, if not then it would just have one spot on the floor that needed repairs. And I'm guessing anywhere that he walked/floated with defile on would be wrecked as well. I'm also not sure if Requiem would only hit me or if it would crash through the ceiling as well (it DOES look like a giant laser beam after all)
3. No. And it wouldn't really be living with him, it would be dying with him, and he wouldn't leave my house until I was dead probably, even if the one month period was up. Bastard.

Thinking about it, why the hell did I agree to this in the first place?

{{champion:34}} -Intense temperature drop throughout the house. Also probably wouldn't cost me THAT much to get her fed...? Though the heat bills would go up big time.
